Headline: 95th- bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th- bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Jarvis. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th- bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Jarvis

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
